name: Music_4023.wav
keywords: ['pop music', 'medium-to-high pitch male vocal', 'melodic singing', 'electronic drums', 'strings', 'piano', 'bass', 'optimistic', 'passionate', 'emotional']
caption: This is a pop music piece. There is a medium-to-high pitch male vocal singing melodically in the lead. The melody is being played by the strings and the piano. There is a loud but simple electronic drum beat in the rhythmic background. The piece is in major key, so there is an optimistic aura. The piece could be used in the soundtracks of teenage dramas. It could also work well in an advertisement jingle.
